items.title: Revised corridor for New England REZ leaves Walcha residents 'shocked'

items.summary: The gold-mining sector is set to boost WA's economy, with 2,400 new jobs forecast over the next five years compared to 1,200 in iron ore.

items.title: Outback residents lose solar farm as Ergon battles push owner to close

items.summary: An increase in mental health and drug-related emergencies puts strain on Bendigo hospital's emergency department, prompting calls for a dedicated treatment hub.

items.summary: The Hollywood director has been present in the film space for many years but the emergence of AI and its power has him somewhat scared for the future.

items.summary: Police say that three suspects — two men in their 30s and a woman in her 60s — are also currently in custody and "have been arrested on suspicion of commission, preparation and instigation of acts of terrorism".

items.summary: Max Verstappen has won the previous two grands prix in Formula 1, but this weekend's race in Singapore is the only circuit on the calendar on which he has never triumphed.

items.summary: The death of Chris Robertson, whose body was found at an industrial site in Adelaide's south on Tuesday, is now being treated as a major crime, police say.

items.title: Dartbrook Hunter Valley mine to stop running after failed revival

items.title: Date set for Townsville mayoral by-election by postal ballot
items.summary: Townsville voters who have been in limbo since their mayor was suspended last year will vote in a by-election to select the city's next civic leader.

items.title: Jane Goodall, who revolutionised our understanding of animals, dies at 91
